name: Adventure The Game
description:
A Game About A knight Who Has to travel threw these worlds to find his way home

its only chapter 1 so there are gonna be a couple errors

1: if you select a level and it freezes on that level just press escape and the game will unfreeze

2. When you jump of a platform to another you might fall through it on level 6

this is only Version 1.0 So by version 1.1 ill try to fix the errors

by version 1.2 there will be more levels for you to enjoy

to make it even more fun for you guys, you could try speed running the game to see how fast you can beat the game, im definitely gonna try it ill post my score on here to see if you guys can beat me at my own game.

Thank you guys for downloading I really appreciate it thanks for the support

leave feedback to help me out

remember I made this game in 2 days so it might not be as good but i tried to make it look good thank you
